channel.title: Usurper (Neutral Investigative)
channel.description:
> # [color=grey]Usurper[/color] > **[color=grey]Neutral Investigative[/color]** > > Night Ability: Track Bloodline: Determine if your target is a Royal. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability: Poison: If your target is a Royal, kill them. 2 use. > > *Kill everyone with Royal Blood.*
King Version: Usurper King, same win con
Can only spawn if 2 other Royals are present?

item.title: Usurper (Neutral Investigative)
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
What was your class idea?

Read full topic

item.title: Usurper (Neutral Investigative)
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description:
NightX:

If Unseen has royal Blood, they’re a target.

Maybe I’ll remove Starting King.

Fun Fact: Inquisitor doesn’t have to live to see the Sorcerer die. This has to live however.

I’ll up the poison uses.

Make him death immune than he will need that.

Read full topic

item.description:
I made a class like this almost two months ago

Read full topic

item.title: Usurper (Neutral Investigative)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
It’s immune by default. I might add a convert later.

Why does it need any of the other 3?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Is it conversion immune? Is adding a day ability better? Passives too? Maybe Immunity?

item.title: Usurper (Neutral Investigative)
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
What happens if an Unseen has royal blood? And they have to kill starting king, prince, and other royal blood they basically side with the evils and the Nk to eliminate their target. I feel like this is too difficult. I think you need to up poison to 2 and see what happens from there. And do they have to live to see the royals die like Inquisitor or just wait until the royals die even if they are dead because I feel like the latter is too easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Usurper (Neutral Investigative)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Usurper

Neutral Investigative

Night Ability: Track Bloodline: Determine if your target is a Royal. Unlimited uses.

Night Ability: Poison: If your target is a Royal, kill them. 2 use.

Kill everyone with Royal Blood.

King Version: Usurper King, same win con

Can only spawn if 2 other Royals are present?

Read full topic
